title: Domain
description: The domain of a site e.g. "answers.company.com."

domainName.description: The URL of the domain. Web pages will be published to this domain.

autoGenerateSitemap.description: Specifies whether a sitemap will be generated automatically

domainAccess.description: Specifies whether the domain can be accessed via `domainName`

pagesCDNAccess.description: Specifies whether the domain can be accessed through domainName.pagescdn.com

answersIntegration.description: Specifies whether the domain is intended for use by an answers integration

reverseProxy.description: Specifies whether the domain is set up as a reverse proxy

siteVersion.description: Specifies whether the domain is a classic Pages domain or new Pages domain. 'classic' refers to classic pages and 'pages' refers to new pages.
